text: Xenorhabdus beddingii is a bacterium from the genus of Xenorhabdus which has been isolated from the nematode genus Steinernema in Australia and Queensland.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * * * * * ==External links== *Type strain of Xenorhabdus beddingii at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 1993
title: Xenorhabdus beddingii
